bug.author: benny-writus
bug.summary: FileNotFoundError: [WinError 2] The system cannot find the file specified
bug.description: C:\Users\amy\Desktop\vaan>python3 -m spleeter separate -i C:\Users\amy\Desktop\vaan\vaan.mp3 -p spleeter:4stems -o "e:\output" Traceback (most recent call last): File "C:\Python3\lib\runpy.py", line 193, in run_module_as_main "main", mod_spec) File "C:\Python3\lib\runpy.py", line 85, in run_code exec(code, run_globals) File "C:\Python3\lib\site-packages\spleeter_main.py", line 58, in entrypoint() File "C:\Python3\lib\site-packages\spleeter_main.py", line 54, in entrypoint main(sys.argv) File "C:\Python3\lib\site-packages\spleeter_main_.py", line 46, in main entrypoint(arguments, params) File "C:\Python3\lib\site-packages\spleeter\commands\separate.py", line 43, in entrypoint synchronous=False File "C:\Python3\lib\site-packages\spleeter\separator.py", line 122, in separate_to_file sample_rate=self._sample_rate) File "C:\Python3\lib\site-packages\spleeter\audio\ffmpeg.py", line 63, in load probe = ffmpeg.probe(path) File "C:\Python3\lib\site-packages\ffmpeg_probe.py", line 20, in probe p = subprocess.Popen(args, stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE) File "C:\Python3\lib\subprocess.py", line 729, in init restore_signals, start_new_session) File "C:\Python3\lib\subprocess.py", line 1017, in _execute_child startupinfo) FileNotFoundError: [WinError 2] The system cannot find the file specified Kindly help me with the error.
